DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the timepoint of when the product (e.g.,human drugs; therapeutic biologics; allergenics; cells, tissue and gene therapy products; blood components and blood derivative products) was analyzed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A thing produced by or resulting from a process. EXAMPLE(S): drug, device. The FDA list of regulated products: animal and human drugs; therapeutic biologics; allergenics; cell, tissue and gene therapy products; blood components; blood derivative products; devices; and animal (pets and livestock) and human food/feed (medicated and un-medicated); cosmetics; pet treats; and dietary supplements._Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it.

Concepts.definition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.

Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A thing produced by or resulting from a process. EXAMPLE(S): drug, device. The FDA list of regulated products: animal and human drugs; therapeutic biologics; allergenics; cell, tissue and gene therapy products; blood components; blood derivative products; devices; and animal (pets and livestock) and human food/feed (medicated and un-medicated); cosmetics; pet treats; and dietary supplements._Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not previously used.: A change resulting in something that is different from the original.: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.

Concepts.definition: The act or process of modifying something.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.: The process whereby heat changes something from a solid to a liquid.: Preservation of cells, tissues, organs, or embryos by storage at low temperatures.: A change resulting in something that is different from the original.: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
